analysis.description:
Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol#515-529) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol#528)
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol#528-529)

Crowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol#531-548) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,foundersTokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol)
	-token.transfer(foundersTokensWallet,foundersTokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol)

Crowdsale.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(multisigWallet,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/13/0x921c149d89ccaa21e9dc0a2529895e078138cc8e.sol#87-92) is not in mixedCase
